items.title: A Jan 6 rioter convicted of assaulting police scored a visit to the White House

items.title: The pros and cons of PSA tests for prostate cancer for midlife and older men
items.description: With Biden's prostate cancer in the news, men may be wondering whether and at what age to be screened. Advice about the value PSA tests has fluctuated...

items.title: Former Kennedy Center president refutes Trump's critique of 'bad management'
items.description: "I am deeply troubled by the false allegations regarding the management of the Kennedy Center," Deborah Rutter wrote in a statement.

items.title: First FDA-cleared Alzheimer's blood test could make diagnoses faster, more accurate
items.description: The first Alzheimer's blood test cleared by the Food And Drug Administration is poised to change the way doctors diagnose and treat the disease.

items.title: 'Which is it?' RFK Jr. waffles on cuts to lead poisoning prevention efforts
items.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faced tough questions from senators about a lead poisoning crisis in public schools in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
